title: Exciting SWW Updates!
description:
Something Was Wrong is still available for free wherever you get your podcasts! However, if you'd like to hear the first episode of season 13 a week early, you can listen now on the Amazon Music app or early and ad free when you subscribe to Wondery+.

If you're interested in submitting your story, visit www.somethingwaswrong.com/submissions for more information. 

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

content:encoded:
Something Was Wrong is still available for free wherever you get your podcasts! However, if you'd like to hear the first episode of season 13 a week early, you can listen now on the Amazon Music app or early and ad free when you subscribe to Wondery+.

If you're interested in submitting your story, visit www.somethingwaswrong.com/submissions for more information. 

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
